posts.post_content: First time for sale today.  Great for grade.  $80 plus $3 shipping.  Will post scan in a bit or ask for it.[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=139118&stc=1&d=1396041358[/url]

Can I see scans, please?  You can e-mail to [url]bowen@bowenlaw.us[/url].  Thanks.

Marty
